title: "AI Model Predicts Response to Spinal Cord Stimulation for Chronic Pain"
excerpt: "A combined unsupervised and supervised machine learning (ML) technique can help predict long-term spinal cord stimulation (SCS) response for patients with chronic pain, according to a study published in the May issue of Neurosurgery."
